Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The homozygous Gunn rats have unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia due to the absence of glucuronyl transferase , leading to marked bilirubin deposition in renal medulla and papilla .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities in the paragraph you provided:

| Disease |
| --- |
| unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia |
| glucuronyl transferase deficiency |
| bilirubin deposition in renal medulla and papilla |

Note that "bilirubin deposition in renal medulla and papilla" is not a disease entity per se, but rather a consequence of the underlying disease caused by the absence of glucuronyl transferase. However, it is still a relevant entity in the context of the paragraph, as it describes the effect of the disease on the body.
